MeetMatcha: ^<color=#ffffffff>You spot a poised girl in an elegant outfit, even her idle standing had a glow of elegance radiating off her.
^<color=#ffffffff>When you get close, she doesn't even bother looking at you before speaking.
^<color=#bbd793>Hmph. Didn't anyone tell you that commoners shouldn't get close to me?
^<color=#bbd793>Oh, but you're new, I suppose I can excuse it this time.
^<color=#bbd793>I am Matcha, the royal of this school. Forget my name and you are no better then criminal scum.
^<color=#bbd793>Allow me to make one thing clear: I don’t waste my time on anything, or anyone, that lacks value.
^<color=#bbd793>So the next time you come to me, it better be worth my time.
^<color=#bbd793>Hmm, however, despite being a commoner you could be special.
^<color=#bbd793>Impress me, and who knows? I might even find a place for you in my... collection.
^<color=#ffffffff>Matcha’s words drip with disdain, but there’s a glint of curiosity in her eyes.
^<color=#ffffffff>She seems impossible to please with a sadistic mind. Stay away from that one.
